Package SampleSubsystemDevice

Klasse Device.SampleBumpBarAccessor

java.lang.Object
de.gmxhome.conrad.jpos.jpos_base.JposCommonProperties
de.gmxhome.conrad.jpos.jpos_base.bumpbar.BumpBarProperties
SampleSubsystemDevice.Device.SampleBumpBarAccessor
Alle implementierten Schnittstellen:
BumpBarInterface, JposBaseInterface
Umschließende Klasse:
Device
class Device.SampleBumpBarAccessor extends BumpBarProperties
Sample device specific accessor class for BumpBar. The device is very simple:
- Status (online / offline) comes automatically when changed and after connect.
- Key events come automatically whenever a key has been pressed.
- Scan codes will be translated to logical key code internally.
- Tone (CapTone is always false).

  • Methodendetails

    • open

      public void open() throws jpos.JposException
      Beschreibung aus Schnittstelle kopiert: JposBaseInterface
      Final part of open method. Can be overwritten in derived class, if necessary. sets State property and calls method initOnOpen of object specified by dev. This method will be called whenever the service's open method will be called. All checks, if necessary, must be implemented within the derived service implementation.
      Angegeben von:
      open in Schnittstelle JposBaseInterface
      Setzt außer Kraft:
      open in Klasse JposCommonProperties
      Löst aus:
      jpos.JposException - See UPOS specification, method Open

    • claim

      public void claim(int timeout) throws jpos.JposException
      Beschreibung aus Schnittstelle kopiert: JposBaseInterface
      Final part of setting claim. Can be overwritten within derived classes. This method will be called only if the following plausibility checks lead to a positive result:
      • Device has not been closed,
      • The device is not claimed,
      • ExclusiveUse dos not equal ExclusiveNo,
      • timeout is negative not equal to FOREVER.
      Angegeben von:
      claim in Schnittstelle JposBaseInterface
      Setzt außer Kraft:
      claim in Klasse JposCommonProperties
      Parameter:
      timeout - see UPOS specification, method Claim
      Löst aus:
      jpos.JposException - If an error occurs while claiming the device

    • deviceEnabled

      public void deviceEnabled(boolean enable) throws jpos.JposException
      Beschreibung aus Schnittstelle kopiert: JposBaseInterface
      Final part of setting DeviceEnabled. Can be overwritten within derived classes. Performs initOnEnable method of corresponding property set in addition to setting DeviceEnabled. This method will be called only if the following plausibility checks lead to a positive result:
      • Device has not been closed,
      • ExclusiveUse equals ExclusiveYes: Device is claimed,
      • DeviceEnabled != enabled.
      Angegeben von:
      deviceEnabled in Schnittstelle JposBaseInterface
      Setzt außer Kraft:
      deviceEnabled in Klasse JposCommonProperties
      Parameter:
      enable - True to enable, false to disable
      Löst aus:
      jpos.JposException - If an error occurs during enable or disable

    • handlePowerStateOnEnable

      public void handlePowerStateOnEnable() throws jpos.JposException
      Beschreibung aus Schnittstelle kopiert: JposBaseInterface
      Will be called whenever DeviceEnabled will be set to true if power notification is enabled (PowerNotify = PN_ENABLED). Should update the PowerState property. Further processing like firing a StatusUpdateEvent is not necessary, this will be made by the framework automatically.
      Angegeben von:
      handlePowerStateOnEnable in Schnittstelle JposBaseInterface
      Setzt außer Kraft:
      handlePowerStateOnEnable in Klasse JposCommonProperties
      Löst aus:
      jpos.JposException - If an error occurs.

    • release

      public void release() throws jpos.JposException
      Beschreibung aus Schnittstelle kopiert: JposBaseInterface
      Final part of release method. Can be overwritten in derived class, if necessary. This method will be called only if the following plausibility checks lead to a positive result:
      • Device is claimed,
      • ExclusiveUse equals ExclusiveYes: Device is not enabled.
      Angegeben von:
      release in Schnittstelle JposBaseInterface
      Setzt außer Kraft:
      release in Klasse JposCommonProperties
      Löst aus:
      jpos.JposException - See UPOS specification, method Release

    • setKeyTranslation

      public void setKeyTranslation(int units, int scanCode, int logicalKey) throws jpos.JposException
      Beschreibung aus Schnittstelle kopiert: BumpBarInterface
      Final part of logical key value assignment. Can be overwritten within derived classes, if necessary. This method will be called only if the following plausibility checks lead to a positive result:
      • Device is enabled,
      • At least one unit has been selected (units != 0),
      • The device units specified by units are online,
      • Both, scanCode and logicalKey, are within the range from 0 to 255.
      Angegeben von:
      setKeyTranslation in Schnittstelle BumpBarInterface
      Setzt außer Kraft:
      setKeyTranslation in Klasse BumpBarProperties
      Parameter:
      units - Bitwise mask indicating which bump bar unit(s) to set key translation for.
      scanCode - The bump bar generated key scan code. Valid values 0-255.
      logicalKey - The translated logical key value. Valid values 0-255.
      Löst aus:
      jpos.JposException - If an error occurs
